sentences.sContent: We can tailor the programme to the patient's needs.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以根据病人的需要调整这个方案。

sentences.sContent: ...But in single-sex schools teachers can tailor lessons to boys' learning style...

words.tran: 定做的；裁缝做的；剪裁讲究的
[服装] 剪裁，做衣服；裁缝业，成衣业
裁制；调整使适应（tailor的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: If you tailor something such as a plan or system to someone's needs, you make it suitable for a particular person or purpose by changing the details of it
